entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
